Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.1 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 Professionnel | CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X 6-Core Processor 3.70 GHz | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Ti | RAM: 16Go

 

when I launch my rocket, the flight crash report appears.

 

Included Attachments:

reportksp2.mp4

Edited July 8, 2023 by Anth12

This looks like it might be something breaking on the rocket as the engines light. You can see the middle section of the rocket bouncing after you hit the launch button. However, the engines dont seem to light, and the flight report usually tells you if something broke.

You could try adding a few struts. I'd maybe look at reinforcing the side booster connections, it may be a decoupler breaking. I usually strut the tops of the boosters to the central core, and then run struts between the tops of the boosters too.
